data.text: @shannonxbyrne Hi Shannon! You can check our website for the call center numbers here: https://t.co/n7s0SEDl2U. If you scroll down, you will see the numbers for "Existing Bookings" as well. If you are calling from one of those countries, you can also contact us via those numbers.

data.text:
WIZZ DISCOUNT CLUB SALE! 🔥
Summer may be coming to an end today, but we continue to offer special deals to all of our WIZZ Discount Club members. Get 20% off on selected flights and travel between 1 September and 30 November 2022! ✈️👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/sCIb2VQGXr

data.text: @AnishaTailor Hİ Anisha! We apologize for the delay. Unfortunately, we can share only general information here. We kindly suggest you submit a claim via https://t.co/D1cECSkNXp and our colleagues will assist you in 30 days via email. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
@S24S24sa @Mohakhu Hi Saleh! We are looking forward to seeing you on board! Enjoy your travel!

@sudhis17 Hi There! As an airline, we require only a valid travel document (ID card or Passport) and the Boarding Pass. We recommend you contact the embassy or other local authorities of your destination country to check if they require any additional documents. Thank you!

@Scottishsmoggy @OntheBeachUK Hi Lisa! If you bought your Wizz Air tickets from a third party, then they are your booking owner and receive all notifications and refunds from WIZZ. Please contact them and they can request a refund from Wizz Air on your behalf.  Thank you for your cooperation.

data.text: @PytanieMam Hi There! We apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

@JoannaAlder Hi Joanna! Children older than 14 years old are considered adults. Therefore, the system does not allocate random seats next to each other since everyone is an adult in the booking. If you would like to seat next to each other, we suggest you purchase the seats next time.

@Elliott12345671 @Cardiff_Airport @TUIUK @CIJ_ICJ Hi there! Wizz Air AUH is a national UAE carrier that operates in line with the UAE's national regulations. All the UAE national airlines are currently operating direct flights to Moscow. Currently, Wizz Air Hungary and Wizz Air UK don't operate any flights to/from Russia.

data.text: @SarahERivers Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.

data.text: @Matt_Fancy Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.
